reviewText: My 5 year old grandson loves this series.  I do not agree with some of the show but kids love watching for hours
Lots of hours of boy entertainment!! Great Value
Movie arrived early and was exactly what my kids were looking for!

Our kids love both Ninjago and Hero Factory and we've seen it a hundred times (not exaggerating). The Hero Factory discs have independant stories. The two Ninjago DVDs have a few episodes each but there are a few episodes missing between the two. So I'll have to buy the full season DVDs to make the series complete. That's the only annoying thing. I'd have bought the seasons DVDs instead of this combo pack if I had known. Otherwise very entertaining for boys and girls alike.
My boys love it.  They make me want to scream after the 10th viewing, but it definitely entertains them. :)
My son loves the videos, it's s good variety and keeps him from getting bored.
Got this for my 4 year old great nephew. He loves them and watches them over and over!
My 5 year old son loves al these movies and it was a great price! Watches them all the time..
